title: Experimental and numerical research on the effects of pressure and CO2 dilution on soot formation in laminar co-flow methane/air diffusion flames
content:
RSC Adv., 2024, 14,30260-30271
DOI: 10.1039/D4RA05249H, Paper
Open Access
Â  This article is licensed under a Creative Commons Attribution-NonCommercial 3.0 Unported Licence.
Yinggui Zhou, Pengxiang Zhang, Shengfu Wang, Jie Cai, Jianfei Xi
An experimental and numerical investigation was conducted to examine the formation of soot in methane/air laminar diffusion flames under varying CO2 dilution ratios, ranging from 0% to 40%, and pressures between 5 and 10 atm.
